caption.p: Summarized workflow for the construction of the LSTM-based forecasting model for dengue cases and its comparison with other candidate models. NNDSS: National Notifiable Disease Surveillance System; NMIC: National Meteorological Information Center; BPNN: Back Propagation Neural Network; GAM: Generalized Additive Model; SVR: Support Vector Regression; GBM: Gradient Boosting Machine.
